block.name: Message Probe
block.make: #slurp def _$(id)_msg_probe(): while True: num_msg = self.$(msg_block_id()).num_messages() print "the number of message received is", num_msg if num_msg > 0: val0 = self.$(msg_block_id()).get_message(num_msg-1) if not(pmt.is_bool(val0)): val1 = pmt.to_python(val0) print "the message is", val1 val2 = val1.get('$(code_type_tag())') print "the est_tcm type is", val2 try: self.set_$(id)(val2) except AttributeError, e: pass time.sleep(1.0/($poll_rate)) _$(id)_thread = threading.Thread(target=_$(id)_msg_probe) _$(id)_thread.daemon = True _$(id)_thread.start()
